title: US Discretionary Global Macro Futures
description: This strategy is managed by a discretionary global macro manager with a strong track record of compounding capital since 2019. The manager employs a multidisciplinary approach, integrating bottom-up fundamental research, macroeconomic data, technical analysis, market positioning, and narrative interpretation.
strategy: The strategy is implemented via U.S.-listed futures and focuses on delivering absolute returns across market cycles with low correlation to both equities and traditional trend-following CTAs. It emphasizes capital preservation and robustness, with disciplined risk management and modest margin usage that allows for notional funding on SMA relationships.
